metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8483 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The blowfishECB function in core/cipher.cpp in Quassel IRC 0.10.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via amalformed string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8483` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

konversation - 1.5-1ubuntu1.14.04.1
konversation-data - 1.5-1ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

quassel - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-client - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-client-qt4 - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-core - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-data - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-qt4 - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
quassel-qt4-data - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: konversation package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-1ubuntu1.14.04.1').
quassel package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.0-0ubuntu2.1').
